content.question: Which of the following unemployed individuals represents frictional unemployment?

choices.label: Marissa, a full-time student who plays on the schoolâ€™s soccer team.
Janet, an accounting graduate who is interviewing with a number of accounting firms.
Sameer, a retired faculty member who volunteers at the local hospital.
Jeremy, a customer service representative who was laid-off after his job was automated.
Elizabeth, a financial analyst who was laid off because of the recession.

content.answer: Janet, an accounting graduate who is interviewing with a number of accounting firms.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
